text:
As your workloads become more demanding, you'll 
need access to high-performance processing

that can execute jobs quickly, process 
larger amounts of data, and improve latency.

Amazon EC2 general-purpose 
M7a, compute-optimized C7a,

and memory-optimized R7a instances 
powered by 4th gen AMD EPYC processors

deliver up to 50% higher performance 
compared to the previous gen of instances.

enables you to lower time to 
market for product development

and consolidate workloads on fewer instances 
so that you can do more with less.

These instances offer new capabilities 
that enable support for more workloads,

They also deliver 2.25x more memory bandwidth 
than the previous generation of instances.

M7a, C7a, and R7a instances come in 12 
sizes, including a bare-metal variant,

They are built on the AWS Nitro System, delivering 
high performance, availability, and security

These instances are ideal for workloads 
that require high performance processing.

Discover what Amazon EC2 instances powered by 4th 
gen AMD EPYC processors can do for your business.
